General.Name: Arcadia Minerals Ltd DRC
General.Description: Arcadia Minerals Limited engages in the identification and acquisition of mineral properties in the Republic of Namibia. The company explores for tantalum, lithium, copper, gold, nickel, platinum group elements, and lithium brine deposits. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Victoria Park, Australia.
General.Address: 63 Shepperton Road, Victoria Park, WA, Australia, 6005
